Fraudulent “#COVID19 Compensation Lottery Prize” scam, falsely alleges association with WHO & others. WHO strongly recommends that recipients of correspondences from scammers (acting under the name Capital Finance, Inc. London) exercise extreme caution.

It's #WorldBreastfeedingWeek!
Employers are encouraged to work with governments to support #breastfeeding employees to 🤱🏾: offer at least 18 weeks of paid maternity leave, preferably six months; plus paid paternity leave. https://t.co/IoD48UXAaJ

WHO & @EU_commission sent urgent life-saving supplies to #India 🇮🇳, following a rapid resurgence of #COVID19 in the country.

WHO & @GermanyDiplo donated a large stock of medical equipment to #Belize 🇧🇿, contributing to its national #COVID19 vaccine deployment plan & health system.
